name: w i t h e r
name_original: w i t h e r
description:
This game was made for both the Geta Game Jam 8 and 8 Bits to Infinity: Anything Goes Jam. Everything was made by 89o, except for the meow sound, which was recorded by SophieMezaM on FreeSound.org.

Click anywhere on the screen to throw a chain. Attach your chain to hooks to fling yourself. Pass through magic doors to warp around the map. Try to find the 8 Easter Eggs scattered throughout the map. One more thing to note: every hook was placed with a purpose. If you're stuck, try to look at them in a different way.

Explore the land of your forgotten dreams. Find the way out and wake up.
